title: Why VW changed its logo, Hyundai takes a dig at the T-Cross - Top motoring stories of the week
text:
Springbok captain Siya Kolisi surprised Red Bull Formula 1 driver Max Verstappen at the Japanese Grand Prix.

A Wheels24 reader bought herself a Volkswagen T-Cross and had plenty to say about the compact SUV.

In case you missed it

If you're in the market for a pre-owned 4x2 bakkie with a budget of under R475 000, we take a look at some of the options available.

READ | Citroen launches its 'funky' new C3 hatch in SA

Volvo is making large strides with electric vehicles, and also in terms of functionality with the launch of an android-powered system in its Volvo XC40 electric vehicle.

description: Volkswagen changed its logo due to be implemented on all future models, while Springbok captain Siya Kolisi surprised Formula 1 driver Max Verstappen at the Japanese grand prix.
